Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board

  • class Board
extends java.lang.Object

    Board

    The Board class is playground of this game, every player will located on a specific Square of Board The board could be instantiated by a config file
    Since:
    2018-5-26
    Author:
    David Ji

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int capacity
      This is capacity of board, also is finish point
      private java.util.List<Square> Squares
      This is used store all information of Squares

    • Method Detail

      • createSquare

        private Square createSquare(java.lang.String line)
        Each line of input means each square of Board

        There is three kinds of state:

        1. Normal: not any picture just a number means current position. eg. 5
        2. Ladder: first number smaller than second number eg. 3 -- 5
        3. Chute: first number bigger than second number eg. 2 -- 7
        Parameters:
        line - every line of config file
        Returns:
        this method will return a new instance of Square

      • getCapacity

        int getCapacity()
        Returns:
        all capacity of this board

      • getNextAllSquares

        java.util.LinkedList<Square> getNextAllSquares(Square cur,
                                               int step)
        This method is used for get all following Squares until next Square is normal Square

        if there is multiple ladder or chute, we should send player to last destination

        Parameters:
        cur - this is current Square
        step - this is random value generated by spin
        Returns:
        this is detail of every step from begin to end

      • getSquares

        java.util.List<Square> getSquares()
        Returns:
        all Squares in this board

      • initialize

        private void initialize(java.lang.String filePath)
        Read board's information and initialize every square
        Parameters:
        filePath - this is config file's path

      • nextSquares

        private void nextSquares(Square cur,
                         java.util.LinkedList<Square> squares)
        This method is used for helping getNextAllSquares() to collect every step Note: recursively solve this until next Square's type equals NORMAL
        Parameters:
        cur - this is current Square
        squares - add all steps into list
